name: spin (Miles Wind)
description:
Here's a new approach to platforming where your movement is both in complete control and out of it. you consistently orbit an anchor point of which position is completely in your control but, you can only relocate the anchor point to somewhere along the edge perpendicular to your velocity. 

this project was made for the vim lark game jam 2021, 10 days long. unfortunately I procrastinated and had absolutely nothing, two days from the end of the jam so here we are.

There were some problems with the build that I couldn't rebuild before the jam deadline.
